Description: Complete bifacial knife: of pale brown flint, with a rounded tip and projecting handle. The surfaces have been worked by pressure flaking and the edges have been sharpened. There is a small trace of white crust at the tip.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Khasekhem, Bears excavator's mark, V.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), 8, pl.XV, group marked V.
Bibliographic references: Davies 1987 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities in the British Museum
